alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Marshall; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:13PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Marshall, northern Tippah, northern Benton, northwestern Alcorn, south central Henderson, southern Hardeman, McNairy, northwestern Hardin, southern Chester and southern Decatur Counties through 345 PM CST... At 313 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Silerton to near Lamar. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Holly Springs, Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Lamar, Adamsville, Sardis, Snow Lake Shores, Silerton, Masseyville, Theo, Morris Chapel, Shiloh, Canaan, Pocahontas, Michigan City, Montgomery, Robertson, McNairy and Crump. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
